import React from "react"; import { useFormik } from "formik"; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import classes from "../Form/form.module.css"; import {allTypesApi} from "../Form/Api/Api" const FormAdvertisement = () => { allTypesApi().map( value, id=> ) allTypesApi(); const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { typeOfVehicle: "", brand: "", model: "", VerifiedVin: false, region: "", year_at: "", year_to: "", price_at: "", price_to: "" }, onSubmit: (values) => { console.log(values); }, }); return (
Type of vehicle Brand Model
Region Year Price
); }; export default FormAdvertisement;
